title: Hour 1: Kyrie's Future
description:
Stephen A. Smith, Brian Windhorst and Monica McNutt debate about if Kyrie would be a better fit with the Lakers or Nets, if the Sixers are close to winning a title with James Harden, Kimberley Martin joins the show and debates about whether Goodell should be doing more to remove Snyder and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Would Kyrie be better off with the Lakers or Nets?
